remarks: A subspace of a Banach space is a Banach space iff it is closed. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
statement:
lssbn.x $e |- X = ( W |`s U ) $.
lssbn.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lssbn.j $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` W ) $.
lssbn $p |- ( ( W e. Ban /\ U e. S ) -> ( X e. Ban <-> U e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) ) $.
